title: Overcast: Walden and the Werewolf (Alpha v2.0) -[GIBZ]
description:
This is - Overcast: Walden and the Werewolf (Alpha v2.0)

A Western survival horror game in it's early stages. Set for release in 2014 sometime. I haven't got to trying this yet, buuuut I hear there're some jumpscares, a good OST, legit combat, etc. Check it if interested (unpack and play)!
--------------------------------------

Description:
Overcast: Walden and the Werewolf is a western Survival Horror game developed by Microblast Games.
The game tells the story of an old hunter who lives alone in the woods, without any connection with the society, making nature his only form of livelihood. However, Walden, as it is called the hunter and the game's protagonist, began to be haunted by a mysterious creature that destroyed the village located near his cabin, killing every person residing on the premises. Now, Walden wants revenge. To accomplish this, the old hunter will hunt the beast, adventure in which he will be faced with numerous horrifying scenarios, alarms and anomalies that only an horror classic can provide.


System Requirements:
- OS: Windows 7/8
- RAM: 2GB RAM
- VIDEO CARD: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 (or better)
- DISC SPACE: 2GB
- Supported languages: English
